title: Wardens against Marauders in neverending battle

replies.body: Potentially my favourite skin announcement description ever
Just a thought what if {{champion:107}}  was in wardens and {{champion:121}}  was in marauder now that would be cool for "Thrill of the Hunt"
Im a big fan of {{champion:107}} and {{champion:121}} and I would be happy is they did that
Are these based off something?  Like the warring kingdom skins?  Either way, they look insanely cool
{{champion:17}}   ^.^
not gonna lie Ashe looks like she is wearing Daedric from skyrim{{champion:22}}
and {{champion:15}} and {{champion:111}} are wearing either ebony or steel plate. dont know which one yet.....
steel plate fashioned as ebony armor :D
Is it just me or does marauder {{champion:19}} look just like nighthunter {{champion:107}} ???
Should of gone to spec savers :/{{summoner:6}}
